snippet.title: Chiki Chiki Machine Mou Race 2: In Space | Wacky Races 2: In Space - Live! 3DO Magazine Trailer
snippet.description:
As seen on the first issue of Live! 3DO Magazine from Japan, this is a preview of Chiki Chiki Machine Mou Race 2: In Space, based on the Hanna-Barbera cartoon Wacky Races.

This was the last 3DO game Future Pirates worked on, after they previously released Montana Jones, Macaroni Houren Shou Interactive and this game's predecessor. The next two games after the 3DO was discontinued were on the PlayStation in 1999 and 2002 respectively. The games were SuperLite 1500: Shinsei Toire no Hanako-san and Mobile Tomodachi.

Despite the fact Future Pirates barely has any information about the company itself, the website is still up and running... though you can't actually interact with it nowadays, as the site used Flash, which has since been discontinued. When the company closed down (or even are alive) is still a mystery.

Developed and published by Future Pirates
Wacky Races (C) Warner Bros. Discovery

#3do #live3do #live3domagazine #3dogames #3dointeractivemultiplayer #retrogaming #retrogames #chikichikimachinemourace #wackyraces #chikichikimachinemourace2
